Package nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.entities

Class EntityCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.entities.EntityCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Initializable
    public class EntityCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Initializable
    An EntityCollection encapsulates all behaviour related to all instances of Entity that are part of a YaegerScene.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EntityCollection​(javafx.scene.Group group)
      Instantiate an EntityCollection for a given Group and a Set of Entity instances.

        Parameters:

      • getStatistics

        public EntityCollectionStatistics getStatistics()
        Return the statistics related to this EntityCollection.
        Returns:
        An instance of EntityCollectionStatistics.

      • update

        public void update​(long timestamp)
        Perform all operations required during one cycle of the GameLoop, being:
        • Collect garbage All EntityCollection that have been marked as Garbage will be removed.
        • Notify Entities On all Entities that implement the interface Updatable, update() will be called.
        • Add spawned objects All Entities created by the EntitySpawners will be collected and added to the correct collection.
        • Check for collisions Check if collisions have occured between instances of Collided and Collider. In such a case, the Collided will be notified.
        • Update Statics Update the EntityCollectionStatistics.
        • Notify Statistics Observer Notify all registered StatisticsObserver.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp of the update

      • initialUpdate

        public void initialUpdate()

        public void clear()
        Clear this EntityCollection.
